channel.title: Web-scraping on José M. Reis

item.title: Exploring UK's late-19th/early-20th Century Secret International Agreements
item.description: “Sykes-Picot”, Trotsky, and the Prohibition Against Secret International Agreements “Trotsky-leaks” and its impact on public opinion The prohibition against secret International Agreements Some theory: why write it down? or why secret treaties are quite puzzling Starting point: a (very) brief intro to compliance theory The puzzle: most mechanisms of compliance are not applicable to secret treaties, so why bother? Exploring UK’s secret International Agreements A prior: what we know about UK’s secret international agreements Empirical analysis of UK’s unpublished International Agreements Data collection and some wrangling UK treaty practice When does the UK publish its International Agreements?
